scene.tuio
Class SceneBlob

java.lang.Object
  scene.tuio.SceneBlob

public class SceneBlob
extends java.lang.Object

The SceneBlob class encapsulates Scene blobs. The center of mass position and speed of the blob is contained in the TuioCursor member object. The bounding box attributes and blob area are contained in the SceneTuioBlob member object.

Author:
Laurence Bender (based on the TUIO Java backend 1.4 by Martin Kaltenbrunner)
Version:
1.0

Field Summary
protected  SceneTuioBlob tuio_blob
          The SceneTuioBlob containing the bounding box attributes and the area of the blob.
protected  TuioCursor tuio_cursor
          The TuioCursor containing the center of mass position and velocities of the blob.

          This constructor takes a TuioCursor argument and a SceneTuioBlob argument with ths same sesssion ID, and assigns them to the SceneBlob.
